main event: A possible aircraft sighting was reported in Loudonville, Ohio on September 27, 1954.
interesting points: The object was irregular and V-shaped with rough edges., It changed direction from heading S-SE to SW and appeared oval and smooth at one point., The object was observed for 3 minutes by a civilian using the naked eye and field glasses., Multiple witnesses, including a report by an employee of Flexible Company, confirmed the sighting., The weather conditions were clear, providing no restrictions to visibility.
witness description: civilian observers including Cln Elmer Solomon
